string-array.name: read_tooltip_texts
string-array.item: Issues can be sorted by date or title. Select these from the tabs at the top of the screen.
"Need more to read? Select the shop button at the bottom of the screen to go to the online store for the latest publications and articles."
Select menu to see more options - like shop, more, delete and sign-out.
Select an issue to automatically download while you read OR you can select the download button to save it locally for reading later.
